title: Smart Home Solutions
content:
Smart Home Solutions

Smart Home Solutions is dedicated to simplifying technology for the residents of Barefoot Bay. We understand that navigating the digital world can sometimes be challenging, which is why we offer personalized support and patient guidance for all your tech needs. Whether you need help setting up a new computer, troubleshooting internet issues, or learning how to use your smartphone, our team is here to assist you every step of the way. We're locally owned and operated, committed to providing reliable and friendly service to our neighbors.

Founded by a retired IT professional with a passion for helping seniors embrace technology, Smart Home Solutions has been serving Barefoot Bay for over five years. We pride ourselves on our clear communication, affordable rates, and dedication to ensuring our clients feel comfortable and confident using their technology. We believe technology should enhance your life, not complicate it, and we're here to make that a reality for you.

Our Services

  • Computer Repair (PC and Mac)
  • Virus and Malware Removal
  • Internet Setup and Troubleshooting
  • Smart Home Device Installation and Configuration (e.g., smart thermostats, security systems, voice assistants)
  • Technology Tutoring for Seniors (individual and group sessions)
  • Data Backup and Recovery
  • Smartphone and Tablet Assistance
  • Home Network Setup and Optimization
